mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_IMG_COMMENT IC ( IC.IMG_COMMENT_NO , IC.IMG_COMMENT_WRITER , IC.IMG_COMMENT_CONTENT , IC.IMG_COMMENT_DATE , IC.IMG_COMMENT_STATUS , IC.REF_INO ) VALUES ( SEQ_ICNO.NEXTVAL , (SELECT M.USER_NO FROM TB_MEMBER M WHERE M.USER_ID = #{imgCommentWriter}) , #{imgCommentContent} , DEFAULT , DEFAULT , #{refIno} )
mapper.select: SELECT IC.IMG_COMMENT_NO imgCommentNo , M.USER_ID imgCommentWriter , IC.IMG_COMMENT_CONTENT imgCommentContent , IC.IMG_COMMENT_DATE imgCommentDate , IC.IMG_COMMENT_STATUS imgCommentStatus , IC.REF_INO refIno FROM TB_IMG_COMMENT IC JOIN TB_MEMBER M ON IC.IMG_COMMENT_WRITER = M.USER_NO WHERE IC.IMG_COMMENT_STATUS = 'Y' AND IC.REF_INO = #{imgBoardNo} ORDER BY IC.IMG_COMMENT_NO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_IMG_COMMENT SET IMG_COMMENT_CONTENT = #{imgCommentContent} WHERE IMG_COMMENT_NO = #{imgCommentNo} AND IMG_COMMENT_STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE TB_IMG_COMMENT SET IMG_COMMENT_STATUS = 'N' WHERE IMG_COMMENT_NO = #{imgCommentNo}
